rooms.description: A spacious entrance lobby leading to an open living area designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns, luxurious fixtures, and modern lighting. Vastu compliance ensured by aligning the main entrance facing North or East for positive energy.
A cozy dining space integrated within the living area, featuring Art Deco inspired furniture and elegant chandeliers. The dining area is positioned to promote family interaction.
A luxurious master bedroom incorporating Vastu principles with the bed placed in the 'commanding position'. The room includes ample storage and a walk-in closet.
A dedicated home theater area designed with soundproofing, comfortable seating and ambient lighting. The design integrates Art Deco style with modern technology.
A well-equipped bathroom featuring modern fixtures, tiled surfaces and Art Deco inspired accents. Vastu compliant placement ensures positive energy flow.
A compact kitchenette designed with premium appliances and Art Deco decorative accents. The layout follows Vastu guidelines to ensure optimal energy flow and ease of movement.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to maximize positive energy flow according to Vastu Shastra. It includes a foyer area with ample lighting and decorative Art Deco elements.
Large windows are placed in the living, dining areas and master bedroom to allow natural light while ensuring privacy and aligning with Vastu principles.
Inter-room doors ensure a seamless flow between spaces in line with Art Deco aesthetics and efficient space utilization.
